title: NASA World
short-descr: Minimal NASA style app with command and telemetry interfaces
description: Minimal app with command and telemetry interfaces. It has two commands that by convention
The 'No Operation(NOOP)' command sends an event message with the app's version number.
The Reset Counters command resets the app's command counters.
The app outputs one housekeeping telemetry message every 4 seconds that is sent in response to an
onboard scheduling message sent by the Scheduler App(KIT_SCH).
Includes command valid and invalid counters.
This app follows the NASA app design style that is described in the tutorial's document. This initial
hello app is a pared down version of NASA's Sample App https://github.com/nasa/sample_app and the
sample app coding tutorials augment this app to implement the features of the Sample App.
